title: Maverin Business Services

images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $861.4K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Maverin Business Services. The average
  contract duration was 1.35 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $240.6K. The longest
  contract was 3 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $488.6K.
lookup_name: 'MAVERIN BUSINESS SERVICES'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '861.4K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '17'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '11'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '65%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '67%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.55'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '820.9K'
s424_mean_duration: '1.35'
s421_mean_contract_value: '240.6K'
s425_max_duration: '3'
s422_max_contract_value: '488.6K'
---
